text: yudaeindeul-eun gidoggyoindeul-i jinsil-i anin geos-eul ttaleugo issda lago malhago gidoggyoin-eun yudaeindeul i jinsil-i anin geos-eul ttaleugo issdago malhamyeo seongseoleul ilg-go issdoda geuwa machangajilo geudeul-ui malcheoleom alji moshaneun bulsinjadeuldo geuleohgedeulmalhadoda geuleona hananim-eun buhwal ui nal geudeul-i dallihaneun geos-e daehae simpan-eul hasil geos-ila
